local super = require 'game/systems/battle/utils/curve/multi_segment_path_ctrl'

---@class straight_line_path : multi_segment_path_ctrl
local straight_line_path = { cname = 'straight_line_path' }
setmetatable(straight_line_path, { __index = super })

---@public
---@return cubic_bezier_curve
---@param path_data skill_path_data
function straight_line_path.new(path_data)
    ---@type cubic_bezier_curve
    local instance = setmetatable({}, { __index = straight_line_path })
    instance:ctor(path_data)
    return instance
end

---计算路径点
---@public
---@param t number 时间值[0 ~ 1]
---@param start_position skill_pos_info 开始位置
---@param end_position skill_pos_info 结束位置
---@param _ skill_pos_info 开始切线位置
---@param _ skill_pos_info 结束切线位置
---@return number, number, number
function straight_line_path:calculate_path_point(t, start_position, end_position, _, _)
    local r_x = start_position.X + (end_position.X - start_position.X) * t
    local r_y = start_position.Y + (end_position.Y - start_position.Y) * t
    local r_z = start_position.Z + (end_position.Z - start_position.Z) * t
   
    return r_x, r_y, r_z
end

return straight_line_path
